Class Reviewer

java.lang.Object
application.Reviewer
public class Reviewer extends Object
The Reviewer class handles all operations related to reviews including adding reviews, viewing reviews, and displaying review dialogs.

    • addReviewToQuestion

      public void addReviewToQuestion(int questionID, User user)
      Adds a review to a question.
      Parameters:
      questionID - The ID of the question being reviewed
      user - The reviewer

      Adds a review to an answer.
      Parameters:
      answer - The answer being reviewed
      user - The reviewer

    • updateReview

      public void updateReview(int reviewID, String currentReviewText, String userName)
      Updates an existing review.
      Parameters:
      reviewID - The ID of the review to update
      currentReviewText - The current text of the review
      userName - The username of the current user

    • deleteReview

      public void deleteReview(int reviewID, String userName)
      Deletes an existing review.
      Parameters:
      reviewID - The ID of the review to delete
      userName - The username of the current user

      user - The current user

    • showReviewTable

      private void showReviewTable(List<String[]> reviewList, javafx.stage.Stage reviewStage, User user, String reviewType)
      Displays a review table with the provided reviews.
      Parameters:
      reviewList - The list of reviews to display
      reviewStage - The stage to show the table in
      user - The current user
      reviewType - The type of reviews being displayed ("question" or "answer")

    • viewReviewsForQuestion

      public void viewReviewsForQuestion(int questionID, User user)

      user - The current user
